pages.title: Create Set
pages.text: Everyone knows engineers love trading cards. Create sets need to be assembled at a factory. There are a total of 27 cards to collect.

pages.title: Create Medal
pages.text: Upon completing the set, you can use a medal with a Create Card in hand to be granted the Create Medal.

pages.title: Buddycard Assembly I
pages.text: Assembling Buddycards requires Buddycards (???). To make Shredded Buddycards, run any Buddycard or Buddycard set through a Crushing Wheel. Shredded Buddycards can also be made by cutting at a Cutting Board.

pages.title: Buddycard Assembly II
pages.text: Create Recycled Buddycards by mixing two Shredded Buddycards and some water at a Mechanical Mixer. To create a Create pack, sequence this Recycled Buddycard through one Deployer and some addition water several times to assemble.
